overview: Kim spent 19 years in the high-tech industry working her way through force, incredible mentors, and talent from administrator positions through sales positions and as a regional director of sales for a multi-billion dollar tech company. As she progressed through her career she found that she had a growing interest in tackling a difficult problem she observed in her corporate tenureâ€” using tools and techniques to manipulate others to perform, instead of understanding the power of intuition and psychology to nurture top talent. With passion and a calling as her guide, Kim changed careers, left corporate business and started her own organization dedicated to helping other find the passion and talents within themselves to reach their dreams.
